consumerEServiceCatalog.title: E-service catalog
consumerEServiceCatalog.description: The e-service catalog contains all the databases that other parties have made available. You can subscribe to those of your interest.

consumerAgreementsList.title: Submitted service requests
consumerAgreementsList.description: The submitted service requests will be collected in this area.

providerEServiceList.title: My e-services
providerEServiceList.description: Manage and produce new e-services from this dedicated area.

providerAgreementsList.title: Received service requests
providerAgreementsList.description: View and manage the requests that the parties have submitted to you to consume your e-services. The requests you receive are collected in this area.

consumerPurposesList.title: My submitted purposes
consumerPurposesList.description: When your service requests are accepted, you will need to fill in a purpose to describe how you will process the data you receive. Your purposes are collected in this area.

consumerClientList.title: My e-service API clients
consumerClientList.description: The e-service clients allow you to interface with the producersâ€™ APIs specified in the e-services for which you have a service request and an active purpose. Your e-service clients are collected here.

consumerClientM2MList.title: My PDND API clients
consumerClientM2MList.description: The PDND clients allow you to interface with the APIs exposed by PDND for reading and writing. Your clients are collected here.

providerPurposesList.title: Received purposes
providerPurposesList.description: The parties that intend to consume your e-services will need to indicate how they will process the data you produce. The purposes you receive are collected in this area.

consumerDebugVoucher.title: Client assertion debug
consumerDebugVoucher.description: The debug tool allows you to highlight any anomalies contained in your client assertion necessary to obtain the access token.

tenantCertifier.title: Certifying authority
tenantCertifier.description: Create and manage certified attributes and assign them to compliant parties.

providerKeychainsList.title: My producer keychains
providerKeychainsList.description: In this area you can view and manage the keychains associated with your e-services, uploading the public keys needed for verifying responses from consumers.

delegations.title: Delegations management
delegations.description: Indicate your availability for delegation and manage the delegations you have granted or received.

providerEServiceTemplatesCatalog.title: E-service templates catalog
providerEServiceTemplatesCatalog.description: The templates allow you to create e-service instances starting from a pre-existing model.

providerEServiceTemplatesList.title: My e-service templates
providerEServiceTemplatesList.description: Manage and produce new e-service templates from this dedicated area.
